text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… Heh… Heh… Heh…!

Whenever she ran she couldn't win. Still, Rice continued her 
training without taking a rest.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Rice is really amazing, Even when losing, she desperately 
continues to run like this.
That's it, I want to make her win somehow.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Excuse my intrusion.
Eh. McQueen!?

This is sudden. After leaving the team, 
Mejiro McQueen came to training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san, it seems she didn't do good in 
the last race, how is she feeling?

She has a lot of feelings for the race and already did a lot of 
training, but for some reason we are not getting results.

She has a lot of feelings for the race and already did a lot of 
training, but for some reason we are not getting results.

She doesn't have the same spirit like when 
she ran with Mihono Bourbon or McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The Rice-san now, might not have a goal to follow.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
On the other hand, it means that if she sets a firm goal to 
follow then she can run the same as before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So that's why… I'm going to change my clothes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm here today for that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have not finished my work yet, but I can still make some time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And, I couldn't stand waiting to run 
with everyone on the team again

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But before that, please listen to this one request.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san!? And…!!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I was called suddenly, to lend my power.

To also run together with Mihono Bourbon. 
That was Mejiro McQueen's request.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I was also waiting for Rice-san to play an 
active role. To win let's work hard.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san… Thank you for doing that for Rice!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Then, just like before, please follow behind me and Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I will Follow McQueen-san and Bourbon-san!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but it's okay even if you do not follow 
up involving your private life. This time, please 
be within the range of common sense

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Then! I'll chase Rice from behind! If 
i catch up, I'll pull your tail!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heee～!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: We will help too!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Well then, I will take turns taking the pacemakers!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Let's all do our best!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san, the way you work hard and your strong heart. It has 
become a great support for us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Please show me once more. Your run 
that won over me and Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I got it!
Team that continues to “inherit” their feelings…

Pushed in the back by fellow teammates, Rice Shower once again 
leads in the “Emperor Award” in the spring.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
hey hey, Trainer-san. If I win, you will invite me to a famous 
amusement park, right?
For that reason, I saved so much until today.
For that reason, I saved so much until today.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haha… But Rice likes the amusement park near here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's fun anywhere with Trainer and everyone on the team. I'm 
happy to see everyone's smile, and Rice is also happy to smile.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's why, in order to make everyone smile, 
will do my best to win today's race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I will be going!
The small body ran though the vast green turf.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower! Rice Shower is here! Pushing up and taking the lead!

Even though the desire to win was about 
to disappear, she continued to run.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower is not giving up the lead! She 
is not giving up! And now the goal!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower won the Springs “Emperor Award” again!!
And then, that feeling is passed from person to person.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
After losing again and again while limiting various work, and 
finally wins at last.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: For real, you made us wait for too long!! Rice, congratulations!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: You did your best! Amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Cheersーー!!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh…? Hah… Hah…!?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The cheers are huge!! The crowd that fills 
the stands is honoring Rice Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Everyone is… Everyone's happy… They are smiling!

No matter how hard she felt, no matter how many times she lost, 
she continued to challenge herself.

When such efforts bear fruit, she became a Horse Girl who was 
blessed and loved by everyone.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Everyone, Thank you!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice, will continue to run forever…! Keep 
running and make everyone smile!
